Description:
This rule detect common flag combinations used by CrackMapExec in order to detect its use even if the binary has been replaced.

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - CrackMapExec Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\crackmapexec.exe' or command like '% -m pe_inject %' or (command like '% --local-auth%' and command like '% -u %' and command like '% -x %') or (command like '% mssql %' and command like '% -u %' and command like '% -p %' and command like '% -m %' and command like '% -d %') or (command like '% --local-auth%' and command like '% -u %' and command like '% -p %' and command like '% -h 'nthash'%') or (command like '% smb %' and command like '% -u %' and command like '% -h %' and command like '% -m %' and command like '% -o %') or (command like '% smb %' and command like '% -u %' and command like '% -p %' and command like '% --local-auth%')) or ((command like '% 10.%' and command like '% 192.168.%' and command like '%/24 %') and (command like '% --local-auth%' and command like '% -u %' and command like '% -p %')))
